attributes.action: Ask Dennis Skinner, MP, to release his tax returns for the last 6 years.
attributes.background: After David Cameron gave an address on his tax affairs, Dennis Skinner angrily responded by calling the Prime Minister ‘dodgy Dave’.

rejection.details:
The UK Parliament and Government as a whole are not responsible for the tax returns of individual Members of Parliament. 

You might be interested in signing the following petition calling for all MPs to be required to disclose their tax returns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126785
